bluebook_errors.description: Using 'ed.' instead of 'eds.' for multiple editors in collection
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith & John Brown ed., 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith & John Brown eds., 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Citation to specific volume of multi-volume collection omits volume number
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Essay Title, in 5 Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Collected document citation lacks identifying details (date, addressee, etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Letter, in 5 Collected Letters of X (Z ed., 2000)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X 67 (Z ed., 2000)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Citation to collected document lacks page number
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X (Z ed., 2000)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X 67 (Z ed., 2000)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Citation to foreword/introduction/preface lacks designation ('Foreword', 'Introduction', etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Page citation to introduction fails to use proper roman numeral format
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title 13 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Titled introduction/foreword citation omits title of the section
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Introduction: Title of Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Citation to series-numbered work omits series name
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Author, Title, Univ. of X Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Series number presentation uses incorrect abbreviation or format
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Author, Title, Univ. of X Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Looseleaf citation lacks required release date or update information
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Charles Alan Wright et al., Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 2 Charles Alan Wright et al., Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234 (3d ed. 2019)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Looseleaf or regularly updated work cited without most recent update date

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Court rules pamphlet or special forms cited without required identifying information
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 12(b), 28 U.S.C. (2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Book accessed online cited without attempting to identify print publication info
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Smith, Book Title (available at https://example.com)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Smith, Book Title (2020) (available at https://example.com)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: E-book citation lacks required information about database or publication format

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Using 'Id.' to reference different book than immediately preceding citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: [Cite book A] Id. [referring to book B]
bluebook_errors.correct_example: [Cite book A] [Full or supra citation to book B]

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: First citation lacks hereinafter abbreviation for works with long titles
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: [Later cite:] Long Title, supra note 5, at 100
bluebook_errors.correct_example: [First cite:] ... (hereinafter "Short Title")] [Later cite:] Short Title, supra note 5, at 100

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Short cite using supra lacks author name when needed for clarity

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Short citation to chapter in collection omits chapter author's name

bluebook_errors.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials
bluebook_errors.description: Short citation to collection fails to distinguish between multiple chapters
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: [When citing multiple chapters:] Supra note 10 [and] Supra note 12
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Doe, supra note 10, at 45 [and] Smith, supra note 12, at 100

bluebook_errors.description: Law review citation uses full journal name instead of required abbreviation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harvard Law Review 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Magazine article citation lacks required month or specific date
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Article, Time, Jan. 1, 2020, at 20

bluebook_errors.description: Newspaper article citation omitted page number or 'at' notation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1

bluebook_errors.description: Academic journal citation lacks required volume number
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Using 'et al.' for two-author article instead of listing both
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe et al., Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe & Jane Smith, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Unsigned student note/comment fails to include 'Comment' or 'Note' designation
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Comment, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Institutional author uses non-standard or overly abbreviated form
bluebook_errors.correct_example: American Bar Ass'n, Article Title, 123 A.B.A. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Article title presented without proper italics (academic) or quotes (court documents)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with title italicized in academic context]

bluebook_errors.description: Article title uses incorrect capitalization pattern
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, article title here, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title Here, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Article title altered by omitting original punctuation (e.g., question mark, colon)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title? (2020) [if original had question mark]

bluebook_errors.description: Including issue number for consecutively paginated journal where not needed
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev., no. 3, 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Citing month for consecutively paginated journal where volume/year sufficient
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (Jan. 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Non-consecutively paginated journal citation lacks required issue number
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Article, 4 Int'l J. of Law 15 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article, 4(3) Int'l J. of Law 15 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Magazine citation provides only year instead of specific month/date
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article, Time, Mar. 3, 2021, at 54

bluebook_errors.description: Date format differs from Bluebook standard (e.g., 'March 3' instead of 'Mar. 3')
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Article, Time, March 3, 2021, at 54
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article, Time, Mar. 3, 2021, at 54

bluebook_errors.description: Newspaper name abbreviated incorrectly or inconsistently
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article, NYT, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1

bluebook_errors.description: Citation to different newspaper edition fails to note edition parenthetically
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1 (late ed.)

bluebook_errors.description: Online newspaper article cited without URL or proper format
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times Online, Jan. 5, 2021
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021), https://nytimes.com/article

bluebook_errors.description: Unsigned student piece cited without indicating it is a Note or Comment
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Unsigned Note Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Comment, Note Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: 'Note' or 'Comment' not properly italicized or positioned
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Note Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Note, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with Note italicized in academic context]

bluebook_errors.description: Book review article lacks parenthetical indicating which book is reviewed
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing John Smith, Book Title (2016))

bluebook_errors.description: Book review parenthetical lacks author, title, or publication year of book reviewed
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing Book Title)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing John Smith, Book Title (2016))

bluebook_errors.description: Article part of symposium cited without parenthetical indicating symposium topic
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Symposium: Law and Technology)

bluebook_errors.description: Symposium article citation lacks clarity regarding symposium topic or nature
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Special Issue)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Symposium: Legal Issues in Technology)

bluebook_errors.description: Article from journal's special section (like 'Developments' or 'Recent Cases') lacks designation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Developments in Education Law, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Developments in Education Law, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [or indicate parenthetically if needed]

bluebook_errors.description: Commentary or informal piece cited without proper designation or format
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Informal Comment, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Comment, Informal Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with appropriate formatting]

bluebook_errors.description: Multipart article cited as single citation without noting it spans multiple issues
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) (pt. 1), 124 Harv. L. Rev. 789 (2021) (pt. 2)

bluebook_errors.description: When citing specific part of multipart article, part number lacking
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) (pt. 1)

bluebook_errors.description: A.L.R. annotation citation lacks topic description after 'Annotation'
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R.5th 123 (1993)

bluebook_errors.description: A.L.R. annotation cites incorrect series (5th, 6th, etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R. 123 (1993)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R.5th 123 (1993)

bluebook_errors.description: Conference proceedings article lacks complete publication information
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, in Proceedings of the ABA Section of Antitrust Law 45 (2019)

bluebook_errors.description: Continuing legal education material cited without sufficient publication info
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, in 2019 CLE Program Materials: X Institute 456 (2019)

bluebook_errors.description: Newsletter citation lacks organization name when no individual author given
Citation to noncommercially distributed periodical lacks parenthetical about availability
bluebook_errors.correct_example: ACLU Privacy Newsletter, Jan. 2020, at 2 (on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Article available only online cited without URL
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Blog Post Title, LAW BLOG (Jan. 2, 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Blog Post Title, LAW BLOG (Jan. 2, 2020, 10:00 AM), https://lawblog.com/post

bluebook_errors.description: Online journal article ahead of print cited without DOI or other identifier
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, Journal Name (forthcoming 2021)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Doe, Article Title, Journal Name (forthcoming 2021), https://doi.org/10.xxx

bluebook_errors.description: URL provided is incomplete, broken, or does not lead to correct source
Using 'Id.' to reference different article than immediately preceding citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: [Cite article A] Id. [referring to article B]
bluebook_errors.correct_example: [Cite article A] [Full or supra citation to article B]

bluebook_errors.description: Short citation using supra lacks author last name necessary for clarity
Short citation fails to distinguish between multiple works by same author
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: [When multiple Doe articles cited:] Doe, supra note 4

bluebook_errors.description: Using 'supra' reference for case or primary source instead of permitted shortforms
bluebook_errors.correct_example: [Case:] Id. or full citation as appropriate

bluebook_errors.description: Unpublished material must specify where it can be accessed (on file with author, institution, etc.)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Must specify the type of unpublished material (manuscript, draft, working paper, etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Research Paper (unpublished, 2021) (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Research Paper (unpublished manuscript, 2021) (on file with Columbia Law Library)

bluebook_errors.description: All unpublished materials must include the year of creation or last modification
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript) (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Forthcoming sources should use 'forthcoming [year]' or '(forthcoming)' without a year if unknown
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Book Title (to be published 2021)

bluebook_errors.description: Manuscripts require author, title, date, and filing location to ensure retrievability
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title of Manuscript (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with University Archives)

bluebook_errors.description: Dissertations must identify the university where the degree was earned
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Must distinguish between Ph.D., LL.M., J.S.D., or other degree types
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Dissertation Title (unpublished dissertation, Yale University, 2019)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Dissertation Title (unpublished LL.M. thesis, Yale University, 2019)

bluebook_errors.description: All dissertations must include the year awarded
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Letters must identify sender, recipient, and date for proper citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Letter (on file with Columbia Law Review)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Letter from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with Columbia Law Review)

bluebook_errors.description: Internal memoranda require description, date, and location information
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Memorandum from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with University)

bluebook_errors.description: Press releases require identification and location if not easily retrievable
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Organization, Press Release, Title (Jan. 1, 2020) (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Filing Location for Press Release

bluebook_errors.description: Email citations require sender, recipient, date, and time for proper identification
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Email from John Doe (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Email from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020, 10:30 AM) (on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Email citations should include time when date alone is insufficient for retrieval
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Email from Jane Doe to John Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Email from Jane Doe to John Smith (Jan. 5, 2020, 2:45 PM) (on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Online postings require poster name, platform, date, and either URL or location
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Message, Law Listserv (Jan. 5, 2020, 3:00 PM) (archived at http://...)

bluebook_errors.description: Interviews require identification of interviewee, their title/role, location, and date
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, former Director, ABC Agency, in New York, N.Y. (May 5, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: When relevant, interview format should be specified (telephone interview, video conference, etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with Jane Smith, Partner, ABC Law Firm (June 1, 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Interview with Jane Smith, Partner, ABC Law Firm (telephone interview, June 1, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: If interview transcript or recording exists, citation should reference it
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with John Doe, Chief Counsel (Jan. 15, 2020) (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, Chief Counsel (Jan. 15, 2020) (transcript on file with author)

bluebook_errors.description: Speeches require speaker, title, date, and location information
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Remarks of Jane Doe at the Annual Meeting of the XYZ Association (May 1, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Unpublished speeches should indicate whether a transcript exists and where it is located
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Speech, Location, Date (transcript on file with institution)
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Transcript Status for Unpublished Speech

bluebook_errors.description: Forthcoming articles should include volume if available; otherwise use 'forthcoming [year]'
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Article Title, Harvard Law Review (forthcoming)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Article Title, 133 Harv. L. Rev. (forthcoming 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Forthcoming books should specify publisher and expected publication year
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Book Title (forthcoming Oxford University Press 2021)

bluebook_errors.description: Working papers should specify the organization/series and number if applicable
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Working Paper Title, Stanford Law and Economics Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: SSRN citations should include abstract number and optionally the URL
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (Working Paper, 2020), https://ssrn.com/abstract=123456

bluebook_errors.description: Online unpublished sources must include URL for retrieval
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (Apr. 2020) (unpublished manuscript), https://ssrn.com/abstract=123456
bluebook_errors.category: Missing URL for Online Unpublished Source

bluebook_errors.description: When URL content is likely to change, 'last visited' date should be included
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Draft Title (unpublished manuscript), https://site.com/draft
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (unpublished manuscript), https://site.com/draft (last visited Jan. 1, 2021)
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Last Visited Date for Dynamic Content

bluebook_errors.description: When author has multiple unpublished citations, short form must distinguish them
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Doe, supra note 10 (when multiple Doe works cited)

bluebook_errors.description: Id. cannot be used if prior footnote cites different source or different page of same material
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Note 1: John Doe, Draft (2020). Note 2: Id. [when citing Jane Smith's work]
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Note 1: John Doe, Draft (2020). Note 2: Jane Smith, Research Paper (2020)
bluebook_errors.category: Improper Use of Id. for Unpublished

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: All internet sources must include a complete, accessible URL
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Internet citations must include either publication date or 'last visited' date
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Internet sources should identify author or publishing organization when available
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Online news articles require title, source, date, and URL (or last visited)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021), https://nytimes.com/article

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Internet sources must have a clear title; brackets may be used for descriptive titles if not explicit
bluebook_errors.correct_example: [Title of Page or Document], Example Website, http://www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: When using descriptive titles for unclear page names, use brackets [Like This]
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Overview of Census Data, http://www.census.gov
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, [Overview of Census Data], http://www.census.gov (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: If document title differs from website name, both should be included with proper formatting
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Article Title, Law Site, http://www.lawsite.com/article (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: All URLs must include protocol (http:// or https://)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Organization, Page Title, www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Organization, Page Title, https://www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: When URL is excessively long, may use URL shortener in brackets (perma.cc, etc.)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: For blog posts or changeable content, should cite permalink or archive (perma.cc) version
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Blog Post Title, Law Blog (Jan. 1, 2020), http://lawblog.com/posts/page1
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Blog Post Title, Law Blog (Jan. 1, 2020), https://perma.cc/ABC-XYZ

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Database citations should use standard neutral citation when available, or proper WL/Lexis format
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case Name, No. 12-CV-3456, 2020 WL 123456 (E.D. Cal. Jan. 5, 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Unreported cases from databases should include case/docket number
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case Name, No. 12-CV-3456, 2020 WL 123456 (E.D. Cal. Jan. 5, 2020)
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Docket Number in Database Citation

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Should not cite database name if case is available in standard reporters

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Database citations must include court and decision date in parenthetical
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Court Designation in Database Citation

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: CD-ROM and similar media should include format in parenthetical

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: CD-ROM citations should include publication/release information and year

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Microform collections must be properly identified for retrieval
bluebook_errors.correct_example: FBI File No. 123, in FBI Records Collection, microfilm at reel 5 (Nat'l Archives)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Microform citations require reel, frame, or box numbers for precise retrieval
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Document Title, NY Times Microfilm Collection, reel 12 (Pub. Library)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Original materials published only on microform need collection name, location, and frame/page
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Doe Papers, microfiche at frame 123 (Stanford University Archives)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Films should be cited with director and production company

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Film titles must be italicized

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Television episodes require episode title, series name, network, and air date

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Broadcasts require segment title, network, and date information

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Online videos require creator/poster, title, platform, date, and URL
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Creator Name, Video Title, YouTube (Jan. 1, 2020), https://youtube.com/watch?v=...

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Music citations require artist, song title, album, label, and year
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Artist, "Song Title," on Album Title (Record Label 2020)
bluebook_errors.category: Missing Album Title in Music Citation

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Classical music requires composer, title, performer, label, and year

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Noncommercial recordings need description, date, and location (on file with...)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with John Doe (on file with author)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, Partner, ABC Law Firm (audio recording on file with author, Jan. 5, 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Oral argument citations need case info, court, number, date, and time if referenced
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Oral Argument at 5:32, Doe v. Smith, No. 123 (9th Cir. Jan. 1, 2020) (audio recording)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Podcasts require host/creator, episode title, podcast name, date, and optionally URL
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Host Name, Episode Title, Podcast Name (Jan. 1, 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: If podcast platform is relevant or helpful for retrieval, it may be included
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Host, Episode Title, Podcast Name, Spotify (Jan. 1, 2020)

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: When citing podcast transcript, should reference transcript source or URL

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Photographs require photographer, subject, date, and source/availability information
bluebook_errors.correct_example: John Smith, Photograph of [Subject] (2019), available at https://...

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Illustrations should be cited via book citation with figure/page reference

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Images should include photographer or source attribution if available
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Photo by John Smith, available at URL

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Internet sources with non-standard names may need hereinafter for clarity
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: supra note 10 (when note 10 has complex URL-based citation)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Shortened name hereinafter set in initial citation; then use shortened name, supra

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: Short citations to statutes/cases should use proper abbreviations, not 'supra'
bluebook_errors.category: Improper Supra Reference for Statutes from Database

bluebook_errors.rule_title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
bluebook_errors.description: For complex internet citations, establish hereinafter abbreviation on first use
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Author, Very Long Complex Title with Many Words, Complex Website Name, https://example.com/very/long/path (last visited...). [Subsequent cites: Author, supra]
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Author, Very Long Complex Title with Many Words, Complex Website Name, https://example.com/very/long/path (last visited...) [hereinafter "ABBREVIATED TITLE"]. [Subsequent cites: ABBREVIATED TITLE, supra]

bluebook_errors.description: Service citations require specific paragraph or section number for precise identification
Service citations should use standard abbreviations (CCH, RIA, etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: 5 Commerce Clearing House Consumer Finance Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

bluebook_errors.description: Services with multiple volumes must include the volume number
Must use correct symbol: ¶ for paragraph numbers, § for section numbers
Service citations should include the year or edition referenced
When citing service via Westlaw/Lexis, may note database if helpful
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (Westlaw 2019) or 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019) [if in print]

bluebook_errors.description: If service uses release numbers instead of volumes, format as appropriate for that service
Some services benefit from including publisher if name is ambiguous
Short cite must be clear; if multiple services, may need fuller identification
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205 (when multiple guide services cited)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205

bluebook_errors.description: When using 'supra' for services, verify paragraph number hasn't changed in updates
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,100 (when original citation had ¶ 72,205)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205
bluebook_errors.category: Incorrect Paragraph Reference in Short Cite

bluebook_errors.description: Id. cannot be used if prior citation is to different service or different paragraph
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Note 1: 5 CCH Guide ¶ 100 (2019). Note 2: 5 CCH Guide, supra note 1, ¶ 200
bluebook_errors.category: Improper Use of Id. for Services

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to indicate the country or jurisdiction of origin for foreign legal materials, when not obvious from context
Using non-standard or incorrect abbreviations for country names per Bluebook Table T2
Omitting state, province, or other subdivision when necessary for clarity in federal or decentralized jurisdictions
Using vague jurisdiction indicators that fail to clearly identify the source country/region
Deviating from the specific format and abbreviation conventions provided in Table T2 for a particular country
Providing jurisdiction information in text rather than in the required parenthetical at end of citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: The German code provides... C.C. art. 100.

bluebook_errors.description: Using different abbreviations or formats for the same jurisdiction across multiple citations in a document
Using non-standard abbreviations for provinces, states, or regions as provided in Table T2
Citing only an English translation when the original language source should be cited per Bluebook 20.2
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Loi relative aux sociétés [Act on Societies] (France)

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to follow the capitalization rules of the source language when citing foreign language materials
Omitting English translation in brackets when reader might not understand the original language title
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Loi relative aux sociétés par actions (Fr.)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Loi relative aux sociétés par actions [Law on Joint Stock Companies] (Fr.)

bluebook_errors.description: Using incorrect punctuation or formatting for English translation, not using brackets or parentheses correctly
Using improper transliteration system for languages not using Roman alphabet (e.g., Chinese, Arabic, Russian)
Providing transliterated text without indicating it is a transliteration of non-Roman script
Translating or modifying abbreviations that should remain in their original foreign form per Bluebook 20.2.3
Failing to provide parenthetical explanation for uncommon foreign abbreviations on first citation
Improperly handling documents officially published in multiple languages per Bluebook 20.2.1
Citing a translation without properly attributing the translator per Bluebook 20.2.5
bluebook_errors.correct_example: German Civil Code 123 (Simon L. Goren trans., Fred B. Rothman & Co. 1994)

bluebook_errors.description: Quoting translated text without parenthetically noting it is translated per Bluebook 20.2.5
bluebook_errors.correct_example: "The law provides..." C.C. art. 100 (Fr.) (trans. Simon L. Goren)

bluebook_errors.description: Inconsistently mixing original language and English versions of the same material throughout document
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: First cite: Loi (Fr.), Later cite: French Law

bluebook_errors.description: Providing unnecessary translations for widely understood legal Latin terms or technical terminology
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: C. civ. [Civil Code of France] art. 1234 [article]

bluebook_errors.description: Placing language notation in wrong parenthetical level (should be final parenthetical with jurisdiction)
Incorrectly italicizing (or failing to italicize) foreign case names or titles per language conventions
Failing to indicate language when source is not in English and not obvious from context
Using improper format for foreign case names, not following country-specific conventions
Omitting the official or standard case reporter reference for foreign jurisdictions
Using common law citation format for civil law cases or vice versa, not following appropriate jurisdiction type format
Failing to identify the court that decided the case when not obvious from context
Placing decision date in incorrect position in foreign case citations, not following Table T2
Omitting the docket or case number for civil law jurisdictions where it's standard identification
Using different formats or abbreviations for party names in case citations throughout document
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: R. v. Smith (first cite); R versus Smith (later cite)

bluebook_errors.description: Providing reporter name in full rather than using standard abbreviation per Table T2
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Smith v. Johnson, [2001] Supreme Court Reporter 42

bluebook_errors.description: Providing parallel citations to multiple reporters but not doing so consistently for similar cases
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Case A: 111 BVerfGE 307; Case B: German Constitutional Court 25 Reporter 50
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case A: 111 BVerfGE 307; Case B: 25 BVerfGE 50

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting page number or paragraph reference when citing specific portion of foreign case
Using incorrect symbol or format for paragraph citations in foreign cases (e.g., wrong use of ¶ or §)
Citing multiple reporters for same case without explaining which is official/preferred
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Case Name, [2001] 111 BVerfGE 307 & German Law Reporter 42

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting year of adoption or amendment for foreign constitution when multiple versions exist
Using improper format for foreign constitutional citations per Table T2
Failing to cite specific article, section, or provision of foreign statute or constitution
Improperly formatting promulgation or enactment date for foreign statutes
Omitting official gazette or publication reference for civil law statute citations
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Gesetz über die... Oct. 1, 2020, BGBL I at 123 (Ger.)

bluebook_errors.description: Using inconsistent format for statutes in common law foreign jurisdictions
Failing to abbreviate code names (Civil Code, Penal Code, etc.) per country convention
Presenting statute/law numbers in non-standard format for that jurisdiction
Omitting effective date when it differs significantly from enactment date
Providing incomplete or unclear English translation of foreign statute title
Omitting article, section, chapter, or subsection identifier type for statute subdivisions
Citing session law format when compiled code is preferred, or vice versa, per country convention
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Statute No. 100 of 2006, BGBL I at 123 (Ger.)

bluebook_errors.description: Using non-standard abbreviations for foreign periodicals per Table T13 or country-specific conventions
Omitting English translation of foreign periodical title in first citation
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 20 Revue Internationale de Droit Comparé 25 (1988) (International Review of Comparative Law)

bluebook_errors.description: Varying between full title, abbreviation, and partial title for same foreign periodical
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: First: Revue int'l; Later: Revue Internationale de Droit Comparé

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to identify jurisdiction or language of periodical when not obvious
Using improper id. or supra format for foreign legal materials
Establishing hereinafter abbreviation for foreign source but not using it in subsequent citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: C. civ. (Fr.) [hereinafter C.C.], later citing "French Civil Code"
bluebook_errors.correct_example: C. civ. (Fr.) [hereinafter C.C.], later citing "C.C. art. 1234"

bluebook_errors.description: Using id. when immediately preceding citation is to different source or has intervening material
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: See C. civ. art. 100 (Fr.). Other authority. Id.
bluebook_errors.correct_example: See C. civ. art. 100 (Fr.). Other authority. C. civ. art. 200 (Fr.)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting country abbreviation in short citations to foreign materials when ambiguity could result
Failing to provide official or commonly recognized treaty name in citation
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Charter of the United Nations, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031

bluebook_errors.description: Citing treaty to non-preferred source when official U.S. or standard international source available
Omitting date treaty was signed or came into force
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Charter of the United Nations, 59 Stat. 1031
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Charter of the United Nations, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to cite specific article or section when quoting or referring to particular treaty provision
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Charter of the United Nations, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Charter of the United Nations art. 2, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031

bluebook_errors.description: Using wrong designation for treaty subdivisions (e.g., section vs. article, para vs. paragraph)
Failing to provide multiple reporter citations when appropriate per Bluebook 21.4.5
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Marrakesh Agreement art. IX, Apr. 15, 1994, 1867 U.N.T.S. 154

bluebook_errors.description: Using non-standard abbreviations for treaty reporters (U.S.T., T.I.A.S., U.N.T.S., etc.)
Omitting party identification for bilateral treaties without formal names
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Agreement between United States and China concerning Trade, Nov. 5, 2010

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to indicate that treaty citation is not yet in force or not properly formatted for draft status
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Treaty on XYZ, June 1, 2020, 1500 U.N.T.S. 200 (not yet in force)

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to indicate that cited treaty has been amended or that a protocol applies
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Charter of the United Nations, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Charter of the United Nations, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031, as amended by [Protocol date]

bluebook_errors.description: Using different names or abbreviations for same treaty throughout document
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: First: Convention on Trade in Endangered Species; Later: CITES
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Convention on Trade in Endangered Species, Mar. 3, 1973, [citation]

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to cite to regional treaty series (e.g., E.T.S., C.E.T.S.) when appropriate
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: European Convention on Human Rights, Nov. 4, 1950
bluebook_errors.correct_example: European Convention on Human Rights, Nov. 4, 1950, Europ. T.S. No. 5

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to provide necessary parenthetical information about treaty (e.g., number of parties, current status)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Treaty on XYZ, June 15, 2012, 1234 U.N.T.S. 567 (200+ parties as of 2023)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting information about U.S. ratification status when relevant to citation credibility
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Protocol on XYZ, Dec. 10, 1997, 1350 U.N.T.S. 400 (not ratified by U.S.)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for International Court of Justice cases
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case Name (Party v. Party), Judgment, 1999 I.C.J. 100 (date)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting case type (Judgment, Order, Advisory Opinion, etc.) for international tribunals
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case Name (Party v. Party), Judgment, 1999 I.C.J. 100 (Aug. 15, 1999)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for European Court of Justice case numbers (C- vs. T- vs. newer format)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case C-123/04, Case Name, 2005 E.C.R. I-1234 (date)

bluebook_errors.description: Citing only E.C.R. for ECJ cases decided after 2012 when E.C.R. no longer official reporter
Using incorrect citation format for European Court of Human Rights decisions
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Smith v. United Kingdom, App. No. 12345/06, 2010 Eur. Ct. H.R. (Judgment of July 2, 2010)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting application number from ECtHR citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Smith v. United Kingdom, 2010 Eur. Ct. H.R.
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Smith v. United Kingdom, App. No. 12345/06, 2010 Eur. Ct. H.R.

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for Inter-American Commission on Human Rights citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Smith v. Country, Case No. 2014-1234, IACHR
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Smith v. Country, Case No. 2014-1234, Inter-Am. C.H.R., OEA/Ser.L/V/II.122 Doc. 5 rev.1 (2004)

bluebook_errors.description: Confusing Series A and Series C designations for Inter-American Court of Human Rights
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Smith v. Argentina, Inter-Am. Ct. H.R. (ser. A) No. 150
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Smith v. Argentina, Merits, Judgment, Inter-Am. Ct. H.R. (ser. C) No. 150 (2001)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting indication of stage (Merits, Reparations, Provisional Measures, etc.) for international cases
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Smith v. Argentina, Inter-Am. Ct. H.R. (ser. C) No. 150 (2001)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Smith v. Argentina, Merits, Judgment, Inter-Am. Ct. H.R. (ser. C) No. 150 (2001)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for International Tribunal for the Law of the Sea cases
bluebook_errors.correct_example: The M/V Saiga (No. 2) (St. Vincent v. Guinea), Case No. 2, Order of Jan. 20, 1998, ITLOS Rep. 123

bluebook_errors.description: Using non-standard format for International Criminal Court case numbers
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Prosecutor v. Lubanga, Case No. ICC-01/04-01/06, Judgment (Mar. 14, 2012)

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to clearly identify which tribunal (ICTY or ICTR) decided case
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Prosecutor v. Tadić, Case No. IT-94-1-A, Appeals Judgment (July 15, 1999)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Prosecutor v. Tadić, Case No. IT-94-1-A, Appeals Judgment (Int'l Crim. Trib. for Former Yugoslavia July 15, 1999)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for World Trade Organization dispute settlement reports
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: US v. EU, Appellate Body Report, DS2/AB/R
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Appellate Body Report, United States – Measures Affecting XYZ, WTO Doc. WT/DS2/AB/R (adopted May 20, 1996)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting adoption date for WTO panel or Appellate Body reports
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Panel Report, United States – Standard for Reformulated Gasoline, WTO Doc. WT/DS2/R
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Panel Report, United States – Standard for Reformulated Gasoline, WTO Doc. WT/DS2/R (adopted May 20, 1996)

bluebook_errors.description: Citing national court decision on international law issue in improper format per rule 21.5.9
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: International Law Case, Case Name, International Law Reports 2010 123
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case Name, [year] Case reporter, page (court country)

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to include proper U.N. document symbol (A/-, S/-, etc.) in citation
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.N. General Assembly Meeting Record, Oct. 10, 2000
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.N. GAOR, 55th Sess., 40th plen. mtg., U.N. Doc. A/55/PV.40 (Oct. 10, 2000)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for U.N. document symbols (should be A/-, S/-, ST/-, etc.)
Omitting session number and type when required for U.N. meeting records
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.N. GAOR, 55th Sess., 40th plen. mtg., U.N. Doc. A/55/PV.40 (Oct. 10, 2000)

bluebook_errors.description: Confusing verbatim records (PV) and summary records (SR) designations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.N. GAOR Summary Record, U.N. Doc. A/55/PV.40

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting resolution number from U.N. resolution citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.N. SCOR, 57th Sess., U.N. Doc. S/RES/(2002)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.N. Security Council Resolution 1441, U.N. SCOR, 57th Sess., U.N. Doc. S/RES/1441 (2002)

bluebook_errors.description: Using non-standard abbreviations for U.N. resolutions (G.A. Res., S.C. Res., etc.)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: General Assembly Resolution 2108, U.N. Doc. A/RES/2108

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting author or originating body for U.N. reports when author identified
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Report on the Work of the Organization, U.N. Doc. A/74/1 (2019)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Secretary-General, Report on the Work of the Organization, U.N. Doc. A/74/1 (2019)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for U.N. committee reports (e.g., Human Rights Committee)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Human Rights Committee Report: Canada, U.N. Doc. CCPR/C/CAN/CO/6
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Human Rights Comm., Concluding Observations: Canada, U.N. Doc. CCPR/C/CAN/CO/6 (2015)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting press release number from U.N. press release citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.N. Department of Public Information Press Release (Jan. 1, 2020)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.N. Dep't of Pub. Info., Press Release No. SG/SM/2021 (Jan. 1, 2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Using inconsistent abbreviations for same U.N. body (GAOR vs. GA, SCOR vs. SC)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: First: U.N. GAOR; Later: GA, 55th Sess.

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting paragraph number when citing specific paragraph of U.N. document
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Secretary-General, Report on the Work of the Organization, U.N. Doc. A/74/1 (2019)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Secretary-General, Report on the Work of the Organization, U.N. Doc. A/74/1, ¶ 5 (2019)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for U.N. Yearbook citations
Incorrectly formatting U.N. Charter citations (should be simple form without date)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Charter of the United Nations art. 55, June 26, 1945, 59 Stat. 1031

bluebook_errors.description: Improperly citing U.N. web-based materials, missing required elements per rule 18 and 21.7.11
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: U.N. website article on XYZ, un.org
bluebook_errors.correct_example: U.N., Title of Article, http://... (last visited Nov. 23, 2025)

bluebook_errors.description: Citing League of Nations treaty without proper L.N.T.S. reference format
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Convention on XYZ, July 5, 1921, League Doc. 50

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for EU regulations and directives per rule 21.9
Omitting Official Journal citation for EU legislation when required
Using improper format for EU Commission documents (COM, SEC, etc.)
Failing to cite Council of Europe treaties to E.T.S. or C.E.T.S.
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: European Convention on Human Rights, Nov. 4, 1950
bluebook_errors.correct_example: European Convention on Human Rights, Nov. 4, 1950, Europ. T.S. No. 5

bluebook_errors.description: Using incorrect abbreviation or format for European Treaty Series citations
Misformatting the foundational WTO agreement citation
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Marrakesh Agreement Establishing the World Trade Organization art. IX, Apr. 15, 1994, 1867 U.N.T.S. 154

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for WTO dispute settlement case numbers (DS notation)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Panel Report, United States – XYZ, WTO WT2/AB/R
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Panel Report, United States – XYZ, WTO Doc. WT/DS2/R

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting document number or country report number for IMF citations
Using improper format for OECD document citations
bluebook_errors.correct_example: OECD, Title of Report, OECD Doc. No. (2020)

bluebook_errors.description: Using inconsistent formats for OAS document symbols (OEA/Ser vs. OAS Doc)
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: First: OAS Doc. X; Later: OEA/Ser. X

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting necessary publication information for non-governmental organization reports
Using improper citation format for African Union or other regional org materials
bluebook_errors.correct_example: AU, Assembly Decision No. 123 (2020) or appropriate AU Doc. format

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for ILC Yearbook citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: 2018 International Law Commission Yearbook vol. II at 10
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 2018 Y.B. Int'l L. Comm'n vol. II, pt. 2, at 10, U.N. Doc. A/CN.4/SER.A/2018/Add.1

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting U.N. document number when citing ILC Yearbook
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: 2018 Y.B. Int'l L. Comm'n vol. II at 10
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 2018 Y.B. Int'l L. Comm'n vol. II, pt. 2, at 10, U.N. Doc. A/CN.4/SER.A/2018/Add.1

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper format for digests of international legal materials
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Digest of International Cases, No. 15, at 45 (Int'l Ct. 2010)

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting volume number or part for multi-volume digest citations
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Digest of United States Practice in International Law 123
bluebook_errors.correct_example: 8 Digest of United States Practice in International Law 123 (1977)

bluebook_errors.description: Using improper supra form for treaties, omitting essential elements in short citation
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Charter of the United Nations, supra note 1, art. 55

bluebook_errors.description: Using id. when preceding citation is not to same international source or context differs
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: International case, page 100. Other material. Id. at 200.
bluebook_errors.correct_example: International case, page 100. International case, page 200.

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to establish hereinafter abbreviation for unwieldy treaty or document names
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora..., later citing full name repeatedly
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora [hereinafter CITES], later citing "CITES, supra note X"

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting required parenthetical explanation when foreign/international material may not be familiar to readers
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Conseil d'État June 27, 2014, Rec. Lebon 312 (Fr.) (describing proposed legislation on immigration)

bluebook_errors.description: Using different methods for pinpoint citations across foreign and international materials (e.g., p. vs. page, ¶ vs. para.)
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Case 1 at 45; Case 2 at para. 50; Case 3 at ¶ 55

bluebook_errors.description: Using inconsistent formats when citing similar materials from different jurisdictions
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: German case: BVerfG Mar. 3, 2004, 111 BVerfGE 307; French case: Cass. civ., June 15, 2010, Bull. civ.
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Maintain parallel structure across similar materials from different jurisdictions

bluebook_errors.description: Omitting date of decision, enactment, or publication for foreign/international materials
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Code civil art. 1234 (Fr. 1804) or year of amendment

bluebook_errors.description: Providing vague or insufficient parenthetical context for how foreign/international material supports proposition
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Code civil art. 1234 (Fr.) (establishing liability without fault under French law).

bluebook_errors.description: Failing to consult and follow Table T2 country-specific citation formats
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Consult Table T2 for country-specific requirements for all foreign materials

bluebook_errors.description: Citing foreign/international material from secondary or non-official source when official source available
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: Statute cited from law firm website summary
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Statute cited from official government gazette or compilation

bluebook_errors.description: Using signal (See, See also, Cf., etc.) without considering whether citation actually supports proposition
bluebook_errors.incorrect_example: See German Civil Code art. 100 (Fr.) [when actually comparing positions]
bluebook_errors.correct_example: Cf. German Civil Code art. 100 (Fr.) [for comparative authority]

redbook_errors.description: Quote contains nested quote without (quoting ...) parenthetical
